verses.verse: And there was a man <WH376> of mount <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669>, whose name <WH8034> was Micah <WH4321>.

And he said <WH559> unto his mother <WH517>, The eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> that were taken <WH3947> from thee, about which thou cursedst <WH422>, and spakest <WH559> of also in mine ears <WH241>, behold, the silver <WH3701> is with me; I took <WH3947> it. And his mother <WH517> said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be thou of the LORD <WH3068>, my son <WH1121>.

And when he had restored <WH7725> the eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> to his mother <WH517>, his mother <WH517> said <WH559>, I had wholly <WH6942> dedicated <WH6942> the silver <WH3701> unto the LORD <WH3068> from my hand <WH3027> for my son <WH1121>, to make <WH6213> a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image <WH4541>: now therefore I will restore <WH7725> it unto thee.

Yet he restored <WH7725> the money <WH3701> unto his mother <WH517>; and his mother <WH517> took <WH3947> two hundred <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701>, and gave <WH5414> them to the founder <WH6884>, who made <WH6213> thereof a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image <WH4541>: and they were in the house <WH1004> of Micah <WH4321>.

And the man <WH376> Micah <WH4318> had an house <WH1004> of gods <WH430>, and made <WH6213> an ephod <WH646>, and teraphim <WH8655>, and consecrated <WH4390> <WH3027> one <WH259> of his sons <WH1121>, who became his priest <WH3548>. consecrated: Heb. filled the hand
In those days <WH3117> there was no king <WH4428> in Israel <WH3478>, but every man <WH376> did <WH6213> that which was right <WH3477> in his own eyes <WH5869>.
And there was a young man <WH5288> out of Bethlehemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063> of the family <WH4940> of Judah <WH3063>, who was a Levite <WH3881>, and he sojourned <WH1481> there.

And the man <WH376> departed <WH3212> out of the city <WH5892> from Bethlehemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063> to sojourn <WH1481> where he could find <WH4672> a place: and he came <WH935> to mount <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669> to the house <WH1004> of Micah <WH4318>, as he journeyed <WH6213> <WH1870>. as he: Heb. in making his way

And Micah <WH4318> said <WH559> unto him, Whence <WH370> comest <WH935> thou? And he said <WH559> unto him, I am a Levite <WH3881> of Bethlehemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>, and I go <WH1980> to sojourn <WH1481> where I may find <WH4672> a place.

And Micah <WH4318> said <WH559> unto him, Dwell <WH3427> with me, and be unto me a father <WH1> and a priest <WH3548>, and I will give <WH5414> thee ten <WH6235> shekels of silver <WH3701> by the year <WH3117>, and a suit <WH6187> of apparel <WH899>, and thy victuals <WH4241>. So the Levite <WH3881> went in <WH3212>. a suit: or, a double suit, etc: Heb. an order of garments
And the Levite <WH3881> was content <WH2974> to dwell <WH3427> with the man <WH376>; and the young man <WH5288> was unto him as one <WH259> of his sons <WH1121>.
And Micah <WH4318> consecrated <WH4390> <WH3027> the Levite <WH3881>; and the young man <WH5288> became his priest <WH3548>, and was in the house <WH1004> of Micah <WH4318>.
Then said <WH559> Micah <WH4318>, Now know <WH3045> I that the LORD <WH3068> will do me good <WH3190>, seeing I have a Levite <WH3881> to my priest <WH3548>.
